title: FSX A2A Accu-Sim Captain of the ship for B377
description:
Captain of the Ship Features

 

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         Total freedom from start to finish.  You are the captain, and are not forced to follow a linear progression.  You are free to choose what to do and when, and your intelligent crew will adapt.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         Intelligent passengers react to the weather, flight, and cabin conditions.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         A Live Engineer manages systems which allows a true left-seat experience

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         Professional Audio with new sound suite including over 15 electrical motors, authentic switches, wind, cabin creaks, etc.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         Natural Speech constructs sentences dynamically from a pool of over 1000 sound recordings strong.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â·         Accu-Sim physics system shakes the cockpit and airframe based on both external and internal conditions

This is very nice,have fun.
